divs: Sighting Detailsa friend and i were driving on the 78 west about to get onto the 5 south and i saw this rectangle object that was really bright. it was pretty big and i told my friend to look at it and what was it. we both didnt know. it started going further and further away and getting smaller and smaller and then it just vanished out of air. it was rectangluar shape with alot of lights. it looked like it was juming further and further away and just dissapeared. it was really wierd..
